h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard
content: This leaping twisting fist slam attack can even come with little warning, as he’ll sometimes yell out while crouching before charging you and jumping into the move.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
This leaping twisting fist slam attack can even come with little warning, as he’ll sometimes yell out while crouching before charging you and jumping into the move.
